territory.notes: Singapore was established in 1299. In 1511, the Johor Sultanate took control of Singapore until 1818. In 1819, Singapore was claimed by the British East India Company. In 1824, Great Britain recognized Singapore as a Crown Colony. In 1958, Great Britain elevated the status of Singapore to that of state. Singapore joined the Federation of Malaysia in 1963. In 1965, Singapore declared itself and independent state. The United States recognized Singaporeâ€™s independence that same year.
